Sentencas: Recently LaNi1-xFexO3 materials have been suggested as good candidates for cathodes for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells.
Titulo: Influence of synthesis route on morphology and electrical properties of LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity and the morphology of LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3 samples have been studied as a function of preparation route and calcination temperature.
Titulo: Influence of synthesis route on morphology and electrical properties of LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3

Sentencas: The conductivity, mainly electronic, strongly depends on the densification of the material, which is influenced by the preparation procedure.
Titulo: Influence of synthesis route on morphology and electrical properties of LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3

Sentencas: DFT calculations indicate that the conduction bands of LaNi(0.6)Je(0.4)O(3) are mainly made up of Fe and Ni 3d states and that there is a small bandwidth (2.3 eV) around the Fermi level.
Titulo: Influence of synthesis route on morphology and electrical properties of LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3

Sentencas: Moreover, a small polaron mechanism for the electronic conduction in this material is suggested by the simulations.
Titulo: Influence of synthesis route on morphology and electrical properties of LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3

Sentencas: Three different preparation methods have been investigated: the glycine-nitrate process, the gel-citrate complexation route and the coprecipitation route.
Titulo: Influence of synthesis route on morphology and electrical properties of LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3

Sentencas: The glycine-nitrate synthesis produces non-homogenous LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3 materials.
Titulo: Influence of synthesis route on morphology and electrical properties of LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3

Sentencas: Good specific conductivity is obtained only after high temperature treatments that homogenise and sinter the material.
Titulo: Influence of synthesis route on morphology and electrical properties of LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3

Sentencas: The gel-citrate complexation route leads to homogenous LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3 samples, which however are resistant to sinterization/densification.
Titulo: Influence of synthesis route on morphology and electrical properties of LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3

Sentencas: Finally, homogenous LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3 is obtained with coprecipitation synthesis.
Titulo: Influence of synthesis route on morphology and electrical properties of LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3

Sentencas: This synthesis is particularly promising since the morphology of the obtained precipitate favours the sinterization at low temperatures.
Titulo: Influence of synthesis route on morphology and electrical properties of LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3

Sentencas: These temperatures are low enough to prevent the undesirable reaction with ZrO2-based electrolyte.
Titulo: Influence of synthesis route on morphology and electrical properties of LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3
